text: The Pontifical Council for Dialogue with Non-Believers () was a dicastery of the Roman Curia charged with promoting dialogue between the Catholic Church and non-believers. Its original designation as "Secretariat" was changed to "Pontifical Council" on 30 June 1988. The was merged into the Pontifical Council for Culture in 1993. ==References== Category:Pontifical councils Category:Former dicasteries Category:Christian organizations established in 1965 Category:Organizations disestablished in 1993 Category:1965 establishments in Vatican City Category:1993 disestablishments in Italy
